Body: When should one use /fubar/ and when [fubar] when transcribing in IPA? What are the differences?
Title: When should one use slashes or square brackets when transcribing in IPA?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I'm a PhD candidate in linguistics, with diverse interests including phonetics, phonology, morphology, language documentation, historical linguistics and sociolinguistics. I am particularly interested in the languages of Africa, Papua New Guinea and Australia. I'm also very interested in methods of making linguistic knowledge and materials more accessible and available to linguists and non-linguists alike.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: trying to learn and help others learn :)
